required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Ensatinib in alK-positive Patients Undergoing Initial Treatment for Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Exploratory Real World Study of Ensatinib in alK-positive Patients Undergoing Initial Treatment for Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer

arm_group.arm_group_label: Ensatinib for treated patients with ALK-positive advanced non-small cell lung cancer
arm_group.description: Ensatinib 225mg QD Until the disease progresses or intolerance

intervention.description: Prospective, exploratory, single-arm, multi-center, real-world research
intervention.arm_group_label: Ensatinib for treated patients with ALK-positive advanced non-small cell lung cancer

biospec_descr.textblock:
1. The patient's tumor tissue sample before taking Ensatinib
2. The patient's baseline blood sample within the first week before taking Ensantinib
3. Blood samples of patients 4-6 weeks after taking Ensatinib
4. Blood samples within 4 weeks after the patient's disease progression

study_pop.textblock: Single arm real world study of non-small cell lung cancer; stage IIIB or stage IV ALK positive NSCLC；
